participant_1.background:
I live in a small beach town where I can enjoy my morning mango and look out at the ocean.
i like chasing comodo lizards on a private island.
i am wiccan , but haven t told them.
my mother looks after my grandmother.
I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set.

I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
i love watching tv and movies.
i m looking for krav maga classes near my home.
i am a karate black belt.
My first big purchase was a new laptop to help me with my job search.

content.text: Hi there! Hows your day going?
Pretty good! I just played a concert last night and it went great!
Oh wow thats great! Do you do it professionally?
Yes I do, I love it! What do you do for work?
I recently took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set.
Oh thats so cool! I love trains, I would love to have a train set too.
I think its really relaxing, and it's fun to see how the trains work.
Me too! I would love to learn how to operate a train.
I think you would be really good at it!
No problem! So, what other hobbies do you have?
I love watching tv and movies, and I'm also looking for krav maga classes near my home.
Krav maga is a great self defense system, Ive heard good things about it.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm looking forward to learning it.
I'm sure you'll be great at it!
